mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_name, product_condition, product_price, product_description, img1, img2, img3, img4, product_category_id) values (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{productCondition}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{productCategoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_condition, product_price, product_description, product_category_id, img1, img2, img3, img4 FROM product LIMIT #{param2} OFFSET #{param1}
